job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You will help to significantly shape Miro's Core product and have a high impact on the daily lives of 45M+ knowledge workers collaborating and driving team alignment with our features!

   You will be working with Miro top initiatives to integrate generative AI capabilities with core user flows and help shaping the collaboration workspace.

What you'll do

     * Design and development on Miro canvas components
     * Integrate canvas components with in-house generative AI models
     * Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs
     * Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy
     * Help with the hiring of new talent
     * Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team
job_details.full_text:
Staff Software Engineer (Miro AI)

You will help to significantly shape Miro's Core product and have a high impact on the daily lives of 45M+ knowledge workers collaborating and driving team alignment with our features!

   You will be working with Miro top initiatives to integrate generative AI capabilities with core user flows and help shaping the collaboration workspace.

What you'll do

     * Design and development on Miro canvas components
     * Integrate canvas components with in-house generative AI models
     * Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs
     * Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy
     * Help with the hiring of new talent
     * Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on integrating generative AI capabilities into core user flows and shaping the collaboration workspace. Key responsibilities include designing and developing Miro canvas components and integrating them with in-house generative AI models, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's emphasis on developing user-facing applications powered by generative models.

phrases: Design and development on Miro canvas components
Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the development of user-facing application components and the maintenance of backend services (APIs), which are core to building and deploying AI-powered applications.

phrases: Integrate canvas components with in-house generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the integration and likely fine-tuning or adaptation of generative AI models within the product, a key aspect of the Modeling task for GenAI Engineers.

phrases: help to significantly shape Miro's Core product and have a high impact on the daily lives of 45M+ knowledge workers collaborating and driving team alignment with our features!
working with Miro top initiatives to integrate generative AI capabilities with core user flows and help shaping the collaboration workspace.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases demonstrate an understanding of the product's impact, user base, and strategic initiatives, requiring alignment of technical work with business goals.
While not explicitly MLOps, the mention of microservices implies the need for robust deployment and maintenance of these services, which is a foundational aspect of MLOps for production systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy
Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team
Help with the hiring of new talent
